description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。第十三届全国人民代表大会河南省代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, and a member of the Communist Party of China. He is a deputy from Henan Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，是张家祥的籍贯地及其在全国人民代表大会中所代表的地区。
description.en: A province-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China. It is Zhang Jiaxiang's ancestral home and the region he represents in the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河南省南阳市下辖的一个县，是张家祥的籍贯地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Nanyang City, Henan Province, People's Republic of China. It is Zhang Jiaxiang's ancestral home.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个民族，是中国的主体民族。
description.en: An ethnic group in East Asia, the majority ethnic group in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据资料，张家祥是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the information, Zhang Jiaxiang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据资料，张家祥是汉族。
description.en: According to the information, Zhang Jiaxiang is of Han ethnicity.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，张家祥被选为河南省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会的代表。
description.en: In 2018, Zhang Jiaxiang was elected as a deputy from Henan Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 资料显示张家祥是河南淅川人。
description.en: The information indicates that Zhang Jiaxiang is from Xichuan, Henan.
